mapper.select: select customer_id from (select customer_id from bas_customer where custom_type = 2 order by dbms_random.random) a where rownum = 1

select tt.item_id, item_code, item_desc, package_meas uom_meas, package_meas, pi1.PACKAGE_MEAS primary_meas, item_name, manufacturer, tt.package_id, package_name, tt.lot_id, lot01, lot02, lot03, stock_env, 0 price, package_level, is_unpack, package_item_id, qty, qty qty_uom, quality from ( select lot_id, item_id, package_id, loc_id, lpn, quality, qty from inv_loc where IS_LOCK = 0 and owner_id = #{ownerId} and wh_id = #{whId} and QTY > 0 order by dbms_random.random ) tt inner join bas_item i on i.ITEM_ID = tt.ITEM_ID inner join bas_package p on p.package_id = tt.package_id inner join bas_package_items pi1 on pi1.package_id = tt.package_id and pi1.PACKAGE_LEVEL = 1 inner join BAS_LOT_ATT lot on lot.LOT_ID = tt.LOT_ID where rownum <= #{rownum}
